<script>document.title = "Flagwars 2.0 CTF";</script>

<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bungee&family=Cormorant+Garamond:wght@700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
/* --- 1. GLOBAL & CURSOR --- */
* {
    cursor: url('/themes/core/static/img/custom-cursor.png?v=1'), auto !important;
}

/* --- 2. THE BACKGROUND IMAGE & BODY FIX --- */
body {
    background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)), url('/files/a043a0f2a1b4fcaa7f487bd216ad1ea2/bg.png') !important;
    background-size: cover !important;
    background-attachment: fixed !important;
    background-position: center !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    background-color: #050505 !important;
}

/* --- 3. THE NAVIGATION BAR (Smaller & Gradient) --- */
.navbar-brand, .navbar-nav .nav-link {
    font-family: "Bungee", sans-serif !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #ff5b8e 0%, #00d2ff 100%) !important;
    -webkit-background-clip: text !important;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent !important;
    font-size: 0.8rem !important; 
    text-transform: uppercase !important;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}

.navbar {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9) !important;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 91, 142, 0.3) !important;
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.jumbotron {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    padding-top: 2rem !important;
    padding-bottom: 1rem !important;
}

/* --- 4. TITLES (Bungee - Pink/Peach) --- */
.modal-title, .challenge-name, h1, h2, .nav-tabs .nav-link.active {
    font-family: "Bungee", sans-serif !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff5b8e 0%, #ff9a8b 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    display: inline-block;
    filter: drop-shadow(0 0 8px rgba(255, 91, 142, 0.5));
}

/* --- 5. CATEGORIES & DESCRIPTION (Blue/Cyan) --- */
.challenge-category, .category-header, .badge-info {
    font-family: "Bungee", sans-serif !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00d2ff 0%, #3a7bd5 100%) !important;
    -webkit-background-clip: text !important;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent !important;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 0.85rem !important;
}

/* FORCED CORMORANT BLUE DESCRIPTION */
.challenge-desc, 
.challenge-description, 
.challenge-description p,
.modal-body .challenge-desc,
#challenge-window .challenge-description {
    font-family: "Cormorant Garamond", serif !important;
    font-weight: 700 !important;
    font-size: 1.5rem !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #00d2ff 0%, #3a7bd5 100%) !important;
    -webkit-background-clip: text !important;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent !important;
    line-height: 1.2 !important;
    display: block !important;
}

/* --- 6. CHALLENGE BOXES & MODALS --- */
.challenge-button, .card {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) !important;
    backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 210, 255, 0.2) !important;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    color: #fff !important;
}

.challenge-button:hover {
    border: 1px solid #ff5b8e !important;
    background-color: rgba(255, 91, 142, 0.1) !important;
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: rgba(10, 10, 15, 0.95) !important;
    backdrop-filter: blur(20px) !important;
    border: 1px solid #3a7bd5 !important;
}

/* --- 7. BUTTONS & INPUTS --- */
.btn-primary, #submit-button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #ff5b8e, #ff9a8b) !important;
    border: none !important;
    font-family: "Bungee", sans-serif !important;
    color: #000 !important;
}

a, button, .btn { cursor: url('/themes/core/static/img/custom-cursor.png?v=1'), pointer !important; }
</style>
